dialogue: I am the angel of competence.
I have come to mark you as an engineer.
Sure, if that makes you feel better.
Can you show me how to set up my wireless router at home?
My phone keeps freezing up. Can you look at it?
How long should I barbecue tri-tip?
The pilot light on my water heater is out.
How do you fix cracks in a driveway?
I need to talk to the angel of competence.
